overview: Her name is Allegra. We see her now, young and beautiful, with an insatiable desire to experience every degenerate and depraved sexual act. But in her fitful dreams we are witnessing what she used to be, and what changed her.  Allegra's dreams of her ravished innocence will excite many, repel others, but they'll be experiences no one will ever forget.
tagline: The shocking expose of a girl gone bad.
title: Depraved Innocent
